Class Scoring

  • java.lang.Object
    • game_engine.Scoring

  • public class Scoring
extends java.lang.Object
    Implement the scoring logic for a Scrabble game.
    Author:
    Rajit Banerjee, 18202817, Katarina Cvetkovic, 18347921, Tee Chee Guan, 18202044 Team 15: DarkMode

    • Method Detail

      • addScoreToList

        public static void addScoreToList(int score)
        Adds a given score to the list of last six scores of the game. Also clear the challenge indices list if score is 0.
        Parameters:
        score - to be added to the list

      • calculateScore

        public static int calculateScore(Word word,
                                 Board board)
        Finds the total score for move involving given word placement.
        Parameters:
        word - main word placed whose score is to be calculated
        board - the game board
        Returns:
        the score awarded after placing the given word

      • isLastSixZero

        public static boolean isLastSixZero()
        Checks if all of the last six scores were 0.
        Returns:
        true if last six scores in the game were all 0

      • passMove

        public static void passMove(boolean removeLastScore)
        Performs the operations required during a pass move.
        Parameters:
        removeLastScore - indicates whether the last score in the list needs to be removed before adding a 0 score for the pass move

      • printLastSixScores

        public static void printLastSixScores()
        Display the last six scores of the game.

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Resets the game scoring.
